name: Magma Escape Lite
description:
Magma Escape Is A Very Simple And Fun Game, With Instant Or Almost Instant Load Times In-Game. Your Only Objective: Get To The Goal Before The Lava Reaches You!! 

Additional Info: 

If You Feel Interested, Magma Escape Full Will Hopefully Be Available Between The Time Range Of Winter 2020 and Summer 2021. Since I Work Completely Solo It´s Hard For Me To Produce Games.  Thank You For Your Time, A Download Would Inspire Me To Continue With My Work :)
